author: Bootrek
title: Great stay
text:
New Premier Inn about a 10 minute walk from London Bridge underground and station (take exit marked Borough Market High Street east up the escalator brings you on correct side of road). The inn is at the back of tesco supermarket down the wide cobbled pathway. Quick self service check in but staff are on hand if needed.
Lifts available giving access to bedrooms all key security to lifts and bedroom corridors. Large room with double bed and usual Premier Inn amenities. Hanging space with around 6 hangers. Hairdryer and plenty of sockets. Very quiet and no noise could be heard. Our room had a view of the Shard.
Breakfast is served off reception in the small bar area. A good selection of self service goodies. It's small but there us an area upstairs to sit as well. There is a limited bar at this Inn probably because of its location near to some nice pubs and bars.
An ideal base for around the Shard and a 20 minute walk to St Paul's Cathedral would stay here again.
